page.title: 07SCHOOL HASELOR, WARKS.
page.content: When I get to school I usually play football. Miss Fox rings the bell in the bell tower on the school roof to tell us to go into to schol to start lessons. On Mondays we get our maths books out,after maths we have Prayers. We sing one hymn and talk about people as well as saying prayers. Each class takes it in turns to do Prayers for a week.Then it is playtime,we go outside and play.Sometimes I play football and sometimes I play volleyball.At the end of play a 4th year child rings a hand bell to tell the school that play has ended.They take it in turn to be bell monitor.All the children have to line up in the playground in their classes until the bell monitor tells them to go into class.After play it is music, we sing songs for that.It is English then,we do it from a book, it is usually questions to answer.
